name: FeatureCardTwelve
description: List-based feature section with large label on left and content with bullet points on right.

description.example: Find the perfect fit for your needs

label.note: Large display label shown on left side (5xl mobile, 6xl desktop)

title.example: Premium features for your most demanding needs

items.note: Inline bullet list with accent-colored dots. Each item should be 5-50 characters.

buttons.structure: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>
buttons.note: Optional buttons at bottom of content area. First button is primary, second is secondary.

itemRules.note: Works best with 2-5 features for clear comparison

propsSchema.features: Array<{ id: string, label: string, title: string, items: string[], buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}> }>
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.textboxLayout: 'default' | 'split' | 'split-actions' | 'split-description' | 'inline-image' (required - 'inline-image' uses titleSegments for rich text with images)
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>

usageExample: <FeatureCardTwelve features={[{ id: 'premium', label: 'Premium', title: 'Premium features for your most demanding needs and growth goals', items: ['Priority support', 'Advanced features', 'Custom integrations'], buttons: [{ text: 'Learn more', href: '#' }, { text: 'Get started', onClick: () => console.log('clicked') }] }]} animationType="opacity" title="Choose Your Plan" description="Find the perfect fit for your needs" textboxLayout="default" useInvertedBackground={"noInvert"} />
dont: Do not use more than 8 items
